newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Sappi put on negative credit watch - D&P.
newsitem.headline: Sappi put on negative credit watch - D&P.

text.p: International credit rating agency Duff & Phelps Rating Co said on Monday that it had put South African pulp and paper producer Sappi Ltd on credit watch for a possible downgrade of the group's current long-term rating of A.
"The move follows the sharp slump in Sappi's earnings in the first six months of 1997 and the concommitant decline in key credit protection ratios," D&P said in a statement.

Earlier Sappi posted earnings per share for the half year to March 31 of 16 cents, down from 215 cents last time. The group has been hamstrung by a hostile prices environment in the notoriously cyclical industry.
